A citizen of Kalaman arrives from the west.

665H 83V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> nVingaard Avenue North
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. This part of Vingaard Avenue is quite busy. The city
square is directly south of here, and the open air bazaars are to the east
and west.

665H 82V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> nVingaard Avenue North
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. To the north, beyond the city gates, lies the harbor of
Kalaman, where many ships dock daily. To the south you see the busy town
square and bazaar.

665H 81V 13822X 1712C Exits:NS> nVingaard Avenue North
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. To the north, beyond the city gates, lies the harbor of
Kalaman, where many ships dock daily. To the south you see the busy town
square and bazaar. To the east is Hamilton Way, where the Academy of
Fighting Arts is located.
A knight of Solamnia stands here keeping watch over the surrounding area.

665H 80V 13822X 1712C Exits:NES> Vingaard Avenue North
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. To the north, beyond the city gates, lies the harbor of
Kalaman, where many ships dock daily. To the south you see the busy town
square and bazaar. Veterans Park is just to the west, a relaxing place to
go and rest.

665H 79V 13822X 1712C Exits:NSW> wwEntrance to Veterans Park
You are at the entrance to Kalaman's park. It was named Veteran's Park
to commemorate the fallen heroes of Kalaman's past. The park is the place
where citizens come to take their time off and enjoy the tranquility and
beauty the park offers. You can head west and enter the park or go east
onto Vingaard Avenue.
A solamnic knight is patrolling this area.

665H 78V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> nVeterans Park
The park has many healthy trees growing alongside the small path you
are traveling on. It is very quiet and peaceful here; you listen to the
birds singing instead of the sounds of the marketplace in town.
The corpse of a little girl is lying here.
A cityguard of Kalaman looks about for signs of trouble.

665H 77V 13822X 1712C Exits:NES> wVeterans Park
The park is green, refreshing and quiet. This is a perfect place to
get away from the busy and noisy marketplace and come here to relax. You
look around and see playful chipmunks scurrying about. You can hear birds
singing. You could stay here and relax for a long time.
A large pigeon is here pecking at some bread crumbs.

665H 75V 13822X 1712C Exits:NSW> A Small Clearing in the Park
This is an open area in the park. All the small paths converge here in
front of the entrance to a small shrine. The shrine is dedicated to nature
and the life it supports. There is a small archway leading into the shrine.
A white marble fountain spring is in the middle of the clearing.

665H 87V 13822X 1712C Exits:N> stYou are already standing.

665H 87V 13822X 1712C Exits:N> nTraveler's Lodge
The lodge is famous for its hospitality and friendly service. The
lodge also has its own cafe, where they make great tasting coffee. There is
also a lounge for the guests to rest and relax or do some reading. The
entrance is quite large and open; you get a feeling you will enjoy your
stay here already.
A Knight of Solamnia walks about the inn, keeping it safe.

665H 86V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> eVingaard Avenue South
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. To the north, you see the busy town square and bazaar.
Looking south, you see the poorer part of town, less frequented by the
general populace. The Traveler's Lodge is to the west and a fine diner is
to the east.
A cityguard of Kalaman looks about for signs of trouble.

665H 85V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> nVingaard Avenue South
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. Just to the north, you see the busy city square and
Kalaman's own open air bazaar is to the east and west. Looking southward,
you see the Traveler's Lodge, where most visitors to Kalaman stay.
A woman with a bag of groceries is making her way home.

665H 84V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> nMarket Square of Kalaman
This square is the busiest part of the city. People of all kinds walk
the city square of Kalaman. Shoppers, merchants and wagons go through this
square non-stop all day long. The air is filled with the smell of food,
spice and anything else you can think of. It is almost impossible to
stretch your arms here without hitting something or someone.
A woman with a bag of groceries is making her way home.
A street cleaner is walking about, cleaning up the trash.

665H 83V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> eMarket Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is just to the west and the bazaars are to the north and
south. It really is very busy here.

665H 82V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> eeMarket Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is not too far to the west through the crowd. Some other
notable sites are the Temple of Kalaman, which is to the northwest, and
Lord Calof's mansion; both are on the other side of Vingaard Avenue.
A street cleaner is walking about, cleaning up the trash.

665H 81V 13822X 1712C Exits:NEW> eeMarket Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is not too far to the west through the crowd. Some other
notable sites are the Temple of Kalaman, which is to the northwest, and
Lord Calof's mansion; both are on the other side of Vingaard Avenue.
Hamilton Way is to the north; it will take you to the cityguard
headquarters and the Academy of Fighting Arts. To the south is the
beautiful boutique of Celeste, reknown all over Ansalon.

665H 80V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> eeeMarket Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is not too far to the west through the crowd. Some other
notable sites are the Temple of Kalaman, which is to the northwest, and
Lord Calof's mansion; both are on the other side of Vingaard Avenue.

676H 86V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> Market Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is not too far to the west through the crowd. Some other
notable sites are the Temple of Kalaman, which is to the northwest, and
Lord Calof's mansion; both are on the other side of Vingaard Avenue.

676H 85V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> Intersection of Market Street and Wall Road
You are at the intersection of Market Street and Wall Road. Market
Street runs east-west through Kalaman, while Wall Road runs along the
inside of the city wall. Market Street is the busiest street in Kalaman;
many of the shops and stands are located here.

676H 84V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> Eastern City Gates
You are inside the eastern city gates. The gates are made of thick
wood, reinforced with iron bars, and are very tough to break. The gateway
is arched, and above you you can see steel bars that can slide down in case
of siege or attack.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.

676H 83V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> Outside the Eastern Gates of Kalaman
You are outside the gates of the city of Kalaman. The large stone walls
rise high above you. From this vantage point you are able to see a few
Solamnic Knights walking about along the battlements overhead. The huge
city gates are directly west of you, and a small path leads off to the
east.

676H 82V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> eBeyond the Gates of Kalaman
You are just outside the eastern city gates of Kalaman. The path you
are traveling on turns south away from the city and cuts through the plains
east of Kalaman. A large building made of old wood stands just off the path
to your east, and you can hear loud noises of what you think is people
fighting within the building.

676H 80V 13822X 1712C Exits:ESW> eA Large Building
You see a large bulding made of old wood, yet it looks very sturdy. A
lot of noise can be heard coming from inside and shadows can be seen
through the windows of the upstairs rooms. Many people are roaming freely
in and out of the front doors wearing different colored sashes. It is a
school of some sort. There is a sign on the wall.

676H 79V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> eA Gathering Room
This is a large room used for the students to recuperate and to tend
to their wounds, study their spells, and consort with other adventurers.
Many people are seen wandering up and down the stairs stopping occasionally
to look at a notice on the north wall. A doorway east leads outside to a
porch and you can smell food cooking.

676H 78V 13822X 1712C Exits:EWUD> uHall of Warriors
This is a long hall. You hear the clashing of metal echoing loudly
and muttered voices coming from all the rooms. The wall is covered in
sheets of paper with the recent Ranger, Paladin, and Warrior promotions.
Amongst the promotions there are other lists of all the different weapon
types that are used and taught to the warrior classes.

676H 77V 13822X 1712C Exits:EWD> wA Hall
The long hall continues to the practice rooms. All the different
rooms are used for sparring, weapon proficiency, and general skill
practices. Primarily you see men dressed in worn silver suits of platemail
and men carrying bows and arrows wearing suits of thick leather armor
heading westward.

676H 76V 13822X 1712C Exits:ESW> sSparring Room
This is a sparring room. All the warrior classes are here practicing
their skills with one another. There is a pile of old worn down shields
and long swords in the corner destroyed from all the abuse.

676H 75V 13822X 1712C Exits:N> nA Hall
The long hall continues to the practice rooms. All the different
rooms are used for sparring, weapon proficiency, and general skill
practices. Primarily you see men dressed in worn silver suits of platemail
and men carrying bows and arrows wearing suits of thick leather armor
heading westward.

676H 74V 13822X 1712C Exits:ESW> edHall of Warriors
This is a long hall. You hear the clashing of metal echoing loudly
and muttered voices coming from all the rooms. The wall is covered in
sheets of paper with the recent Ranger, Paladin, and Warrior promotions.
Amongst the promotions there are other lists of all the different weapon
types that are used and taught to the warrior classes.

676H 73V 13822X 1712C Exits:EWD> A Gathering Room
This is a large room used for the students to recuperate and to tend
to their wounds, study their spells, and consort with other adventurers.
Many people are seen wandering up and down the stairs stopping occasionally
to look at a notice on the north wall. A doorway east leads outside to a
porch and you can smell food cooking.

676H 72V 13822X 1712C Exits:EWUD> wA Large Building
You see a large bulding made of old wood, yet it looks very sturdy. A
lot of noise can be heard coming from inside and shadows can be seen
through the windows of the upstairs rooms. Many people are roaming freely
in and out of the front doors wearing different colored sashes. It is a
school of some sort. There is a sign on the wall.

676H 71V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> wwBeyond the Gates of Kalaman
You are just outside the eastern city gates of Kalaman. The path you
are traveling on turns south away from the city and cuts through the plains
east of Kalaman. A large building made of old wood stands just off the path
to your east, and you can hear loud noises of what you think is people
fighting within the building.

676H 70V 13822X 1712C Exits:ESW> wOutside the Eastern Gates of Kalaman
You are outside the gates of the city of Kalaman. The large stone walls
rise high above you. From this vantage point you are able to see a few
Solamnic Knights walking about along the battlements overhead. The huge
city gates are directly west of you, and a small path leads off to the
east.

676H 68V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> wwEastern City Gates
You are inside the eastern city gates. The gates are made of thick
wood, reinforced with iron bars, and are very tough to break. The gateway
is arched, and above you you can see steel bars that can slide down in case
of siege or attack.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.
A cityguard of Kalaman stands here, guarding the eastern gates.

676H 67V 13822X 1712C Exits:EW> wwIntersection of Market Street and Wall Road
You are at the intersection of Market Street and Wall Road. Market
Street runs east-west through Kalaman, while Wall Road runs along the
inside of the city wall. Market Street is the busiest street in Kalaman;
many of the shops and stands are located here.
The Lord's personal guard is standing here.
The Lord's personal guard is standing here.
The Lord's personal guard is standing here.
Lord Calof is here pondering over some political matters.

676H 66V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> wMarket Street East
This is the busy market street, filled with people, shops and stands.
People from all over Krynn come to this town for trade and other business.
The town square is not too far to the west through the crowd. Some other
notable sites are the Temple of Kalaman, which is to the northwest, and
Lord Calof's mansion; both are on the other side of Vingaard Avenue.

676H 61V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> wMarket Square of Kalaman
This square is the busiest part of the city. People of all kinds walk
the city square of Kalaman. Shoppers, merchants and wagons go through this
square non-stop all day long. The air is filled with the smell of food,
spice and anything else you can think of. It is almost impossible to
stretch your arms here without hitting something or someone.
A woman with a bag of groceries is making her way home.
A street cleaner is walking about, cleaning up the trash.

676H 60V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> sVingaard Avenue South
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. Just to the north, you see the busy city square and
Kalaman's own open air bazaar is to the east and west. Looking southward,
you see the Traveler's Lodge, where most visitors to Kalaman stay.
A woman with a bag of groceries is making her way home.

676H 59V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> sVingaard Avenue South
This is Vingaard Avenue, a well traveled street that runs north-south
through Kalaman. To the north, you see the busy town square and bazaar.
Looking south, you see the poorer part of town, less frequented by the
general populace. The Traveler's Lodge is to the west and a fine diner is
to the east.
A senior ranking knight is here coordinating an exercise.
A cityguard of Kalaman looks about for signs of trouble.

676H 58V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> wsA Kalaman cityguard leaves south.
Traveler's Lodge
The lodge is famous for its hospitality and friendly service. The
lodge also has its own cafe, where they make great tasting coffee. There is
also a lounge for the guests to rest and relax or do some reading. The
entrance is quite large and open; you get a feeling you will enjoy your
stay here already.
A Knight of Solamnia walks about the inn, keeping it safe.

676H 57V 13822X 1712C Exits:NESW> The Reception
This is the reception of the lodge, where you would sign in for a
room. This is also a very popular place where adventurers sit around and
share tales of their journeys. Some stairs in the back lead up to the
quarters.

quarters.

676H 87V 13822X 1712C Exits:N> lThe Reception
This is the reception of the lodge, where you would sign in for a
room. This is also a very popular place where adventurers sit around and
share tales of their journeys. Some stairs in the back lead up to the
quarters.
A wooden bulletin board with the heading 'Wanted' is posted on the wall.
A delicious loaf of bread rests upon the ground. [9]
